name: Area clear, access good, enough space for install
ERV installed straight and level and correct orientation.
Fan or Cowl sealed to Upstand
Access Panels in duct for fire dampers, filters, cleaning etc
Duct fittings/joins sealed and mechanically fixed to duct. SAB joins sealed
Flexible ducts run straight/tight/well supported/secured close to grille location
Supply cable installed correctly, protected and secured
Plans marked up for As Builts and 2nd fix grille locations
Flexible ducts taped then cable tied to grilles/boots
Fans/Filters/Dampers/Access Panels etc all still accessible for maintenance
Area left clean and tidy, fingerprints removed
Commissioning paperwork reviewed and accepted by Project Manager
Fridge or Water Pipes connected to unit, correct valves and fittings
Unit Plenum Boxes to be installed
Correct Fall to tundish , and water flow tested
Flexible ducts taped then cable tied to grilles/boots
Fans/Filters/Dampers/Access Panels etc all still accessible for maintenance
Transmission cable fitted off and labelled to and from if daisy chained
Area left clean and tidy, fingerprints removed
Electrical Isolators installed in Correct location
